title: viTTa vazhi
sahitya:
viTTa vazhi selgirEn un iccai


anupallavi

  shuTTu posukkuginra tunba vanAntarattil tuNaiyinri manamUnri iNaiyaTra tOzhanE


caraNam    sOrinri un peyar shollip-pashiyAri sOmaninrik-kuzhandai yAm ena mAriyE
ArillA UrukkuinkAshamE gati pOl ayyA nin anbaiyE meyyAga nambi nI
